tool_description: Tatum Blockchain API is a RESTful JSON API. REST API enables you to access our infrastructure and interact with blockchains over HTTPS protocol.
name: Tatum Blockchain API Testnet
title: Tatum Blockchain API Testnet

api_list.name: BtcGetBlockChainInfo
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tatum-blockchain-api-testnet1.p.rapidapi.com/bitcoin/v2/info"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tatum-blockchain-api-testnet1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: BtcGenerateWallet
api_list.description:
Tatum supports BIP44 HD wallets. It is very convenient and secure, since it can generate 2^32-1 addresses from 1 mnemonic phrase. Mnemonic phrase consists of 12 special words in defined order and can restore access to all generated addresses and private keys.
Each address is identified by 3 main values:

  • Private Key - your secret value, which should never be revealed
  • Public Key - public address to be published
  • Derivation index - index of generated address

Tatum follows BIP44 specification and generates for Bitcoin wallet with derivation path m'/44'/0'/0'/0. More about BIP44 HD wallets can be found here - https://github.com/bitcoin/bips/blob/master/bip-0044.mediawiki. Generate BIP44 compatible Bitcoin wallet. For security and privacy reasons, this method should be called from local instance of Tatum Middleware, see https://github.com/tatumio/tatum-middleware.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tatum-blockchain-api-testnet1.p.rapidapi.com/bitcoin/v2/wallet"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tatum-blockchain-api-testnet1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: BtcGetTxByAddress

required_parameters.name: reverse
required_parameters.description: Reverse the order of transactions, false - from oldest to latest, true - from latest to oldest.

optional_parameters.name: after
optional_parameters.description: A txid to include transactions after, this is often the last txid of a previous query.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return.

api_list.name: EthGenerateWallet
api_list.description:
Tatum supports BIP44 HD wallets. It is very convenient and secure, since it can generate 2^32-1 addresses from 1 mnemonic phrase. Mnemonic phrase consists of 12 special words in defined order and can restore access to all generated addresses and private keys.
Each address is identified by 3 main values:

  • Private Key - your secret value, which should never be revealed
  • Public Key - public address to be published
  • Derivation index - index of generated address

Tatum follows BIP44 specification and generates for Ethereum wallet with derivation path m'/44'/60'/0'/0. More about BIP44 HD wallets can be found here - https://github.com/bitcoin/bips/blob/master/bip-0044.mediawiki. Generate BIP44 compatible Ethereum wallet. For security and privacy reasons, this method should be called from local instance of Tatum Middleware, see https://github.com/tatumio/tatum-middleware.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tatum-blockchain-api-testnet1.p.rapidapi.com/ethereum/v2/wallet"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tatum-blockchain-api-testnet1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: EthErc20GetBalance
api_list.description: Get Ethereum ERC20 Account balance in smallest ERC20 unit.

optional_parameters.name: currency
optional_parameters.description: Tatum supported ERC20 currency. Either currency, or contractAddress must be present.

optional_parameters.name: contractAddress
optional_parameters.description: ERC20 contract address to get balance of. Either contractAddress, or currency must be present.
